Posts.Content: Apr 6, 2008 11:27PM whatsup wrote: dear sue and ladies who have posted to her: i am deeply moved by the encouragement you have givin sue and sue i am so proud of you for reaching out and at least typing up your thoughts, anger, scaredness, and honesty.  reading this thread shows me so much.  please sue, always remember what u said yourself  "I am still happy go lucky and strong.....that is my core ...not the stress"  I was diagnosed with stage 4 @ 30yrs old, and have a big family history.  u r not alone...and its 2008...u can end this family curse...you can bie there for your boys....and u will u will see like i have learned...i am much stonger than i ever knew.  U will see..... i promise u. wishing u peace of mind - ps) how amazing to read this from the top....and see how u all really were there for sue....great job....u r all so stong and i am so proud.
Posts.Title: please help sueps barbe1958
